Uses of Interface
com.luigisgro.cqf.curve.TimePoint

Packages that use TimePoint
com.luigisgro.cqf.curve Interest rate curves and curve time-series data types for HJM processing 
com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm Core package with the implementation of the Monte Carlo simulation framework MultiFactorModel specifically for the HJM model (MultiFactorHJM) and the implementation of some interest rate derivative models to be used with it. 
com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo The Monte Carlo framework, in a generic implementation for curve time series, with a generic number of factors. 
com.luigisgro.cqf.pca Implementation of the Principal Component Analysis needed for the HJM model. 
 

Uses of TimePoint in com.luigisgro.cqf.curve
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.curve with type parameters of type TimePoint
 class CurveTimeSeries<T extends TimePoint>
          An ordered set of Curve objects with the same TermStructure each associated to a TimePoint.
 interface CurveTimeSeriesOperator<T extends TimePoint>
          An abstract operator extracting a scalar from a curve time series
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.curve that implement TimePoint

          Day implementation of TimePoint class

Uses of TimePoint in com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm with type parameters of type TimePoint
 class Cap<T extends TimePoint>
          Implements a Cap by providing the caplet payoff
 class Floor<T extends TimePoint>
          Implements a Floor by providing the floorlet payoff
 class ForwardInterestRate<T extends TimePoint>
          This class calculates the forward rate for a given tenor, based on a curve time series of instantaneous interest rates.
 class SeriesOfOptions<T extends TimePoint>
          Structure common to Cap and Floor, which uses simple caplets and floorlets to implement the complex evaluation of these derivatives
 class Xlet<T extends TimePoint>
          This class embeds the common logic of a caplet and floorlet.
 interface XletFactory<T extends TimePoint>
          Factory interface for creation of caplets and floorlets
 class ZCB<T extends TimePoint>
          Discount operator.

Uses of TimePoint in com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo with type parameters of type TimePoint
 class CurveTimeSeriesOperatorEvaluator<T extends TimePoint>
          A simple evaluator that always stop at the given number of iterations
 interface MonteCarloEvaluator<T extends TimePoint>
          Objects responsible for calculating the derivative value corresponding to a given iteration of the Monte Carlo simulation, from a state of the underlying (scenario).
 class MonteCarloSimulation<T extends TimePoint>
          Skeleton of a Monte Carlo simulation.
 class StandardErrorEvaluator<T extends TimePoint>
          An implementation of MonteCarloEvaluator based on the notion of "standard error".
 

Constructors in com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo with parameters of type TimePoint

          Creates a new Monte Carlo simulation framework
 

Uses of TimePoint in com.luigisgro.cqf.pca
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.pca with type parameters of type TimePoint
 class CurveTimeSeriesMatrixAdapter<T extends TimePoint>
          A wrapper of CurveTimeSeries that exposes the Matrix interface, to enable matrix arithmetic on curve time series
 class PCA<T extends TimePoint>
          The top-level class implementing PCA on the covariance matrix of a curve time series
